ExpertModeSet(uint, uint, uint, NVAPIOglExpertCallback?)

Configure OpenGL expert mode for the current context.

public bool? ExpertModeSet(uint detailMask, uint reportMask, uint outputMask, NVAPIOglExpertCallback? callback = null)

Parameters

detailMask uint

Detail mask (NVAPI_OGLEXPERT_DETAIL_*).

reportMask uint

Report mask (NVAPI_OGLEXPERT_REPORT_*).

outputMask uint

Output mask (NVAPI_OGLEXPERT_OUTPUT_*).

callback NVAPIOglExpertCallback

Optional callback for output-to-callback.

Returns

bool?

True if applied, null if unsupported.
